thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Apple Dodges iPhone X Worries

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Apple Dodges iPhone X Worries
text:
If Apple Inc.’s iPhone X is a problem, so far it’s a high-quality one.
Apple launched the expensive device later than usual during its fiscal first quarter that ended Dec. 30. The phone came on the 10th anniversary of the company’s first smartphone, and was heralded by Apple and its fans as the “future of smartphones.” But an opening price of $1,000 is rich for any smartphone, and production issues appeared to keep supply of the phone relatively tight at least in the first few weeks after its early November launch.
...
